required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Osimertinib in Ethnic Chinese With EGFR and T790M Mutated NSCLC
clinical_study.official_title: An Observational, Retrospective, Real World Study of Osimertinib in Ethnic Chinese Patients With Locally Advanced/Metastatic T790M Mutation-Positive Non-small-cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC )Progressed on Previous Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor (EGFR) Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor (TKI).

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the effectiveness and safety of osimertinib treatment in a real world setting.

detailed_description.textblock: The current study will not only assess the effectiveness of osimertinib treatment in a real world setting, but will also help us to understand the real-world testing patterns among T790M mutation positive locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC patients who have progressed after EGFR TKI treatment.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Followed up with 6 months after last patient in
primary_outcome.description: Overall response rate (ORR), defined as the proportion of patients with a best response of "responding" to treatment by investigator assessment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Followed up 10 months after last subject in
secondary_outcome.description: Progression free survival (PFS), defined as the time from the date of first dose of osimertinib to the date of investigator-assessed disease progression or death from any cause during study. Subjects who have not progressed or died at the time of analysis will be censored at the time of the latest date of assessment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Followed up 10 months after last patient in
secondary_outcome.description: To assess by number of previous adopted/current/future therapies as recorded on the case report form

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Follow up 10 months after last patient in.
secondary_outcome.description: To assess by number of adverse events as recorded on the case report form.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Follow up 10 months after last patient in.
secondary_outcome.description: To assess by intensity of adverse events as recorded on the case report form, which will be measured by CTCAE grade system
To assess by proportion of testing samples types as recorded on the case report form.
To assess by proportion of each testing platform as recorded on the case report form.
To assess by proportion of EGFR mutation subtype as recorded on the case report form

arm_group.description: Patients with locally advanced/metastatic EGFR T790M positive NSCLC progressed on previous EGFR TKI

study_pop.textblock: Locally advanced or metastatic T790M mutation-positive NSCLC patients progressed after EGFR TKI treatment.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Above 18 years of age;
- Locally advanced (stage IIIB) or metastatic (stage IV) NSCLC, not amenable to curative surgery or radiotherapy
- Confirmed T790M mutation
- Progressed on previous EGFR TKI treatment. Patients may have also received additional lines of treatment
- Received osimertinib treatment in the participating site between May 1st and Oct 31st 2016
Exclusion Criteria:
â€¢ Enrolment in studies that prohibit any participation in this observational study
